item.title: Migrate Network with HCX
item.description: VMware’s Hybrid Cloud eXtension (HCX) platform can be used to: Migrate Virtual Machine from source datacenter to AVS Migrate Network segment from source datacenter to AVS In this article we’ll explore steps which can be taken to seemlessly migrate network from VMware based source datacenter over to AVS. Network Migration States We’ll explore the transition with the following states: Initial State: where source datacenter has network connection to AVS private cloud.
